Posts.Content: Just read your comments Bigburd33. I have this side effect - some days worse than others. Really depressing me now. Did you find it settled down? I’ve been on tamoxifen now for nearly 2 years (this effect getting worse) with a gao in between as I couldn’t cope with the joint aches. Pain seems less on Teva but more hot flushes, night sweats and the added bladder thing. Totally wondering if it’s all worth it.  hope you’re doing better with the Milan.
Posts.Title: Tamoxifen brands UK list? trying to find one that suits me!
